name: Yandere No Sutoka
summary:
Yandere no Sutoka is a spin-off minigame by YandereDev and AMZE. 

The game is a parody of Saiko no Sutoka, a game by Habupain where the player must escape a yandere girl chasing you in a school setting. In this, you can escape either Ayano or Ayato in Akademi High, by finding the exit key to get out of the school while avoiding the yandere.

The game was released October 31, 2020 for Halloween.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Horror
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020-10-31 (v1.1)
  • 售价: FREE
  • 官方网站: https://amzemods.wordpress.com/2020/11/01/yandere-no-sutoka-version-1-1-general-improvements-update/
